name: Game! (Tyler Martin)
description:
My first game in godot engine!

(This game isn't finished yet, I will add more levels later.

Game! Is a platformer game, where the goal is to get the lowest score possible. This isn't easy, because coins and enemies are everywhere!

Controls: Left and Right arrow keys to move, Up arrow key to jump, R key to restart.

Game was made in godot engine.  All music was made in ecrettmusic.

Please give me feedback on what's good about this game, or what I should do differently. This is my first game, so this helps a lot!
